column3: Every girls' night needs a funny movie and a good conversation about guys! My friends and I also love picking outfits out for each other to try on at slumber parties. It's so fun.
Life is funny. If you don't laugh, you're in trouble.
I'm not too keen on jokes that are one-liners. I want the situation to be funny.

I'm very physical. I'm extremely active, and I would love to do something a little more sexy and dangerous, a la Sophia Loren, or funny and humorous, a la Woody Allen. Getting to do things along those lines would be extremely wicked and a dream come true.
It's funny; as I get older I'm reverting to my roots - I want to plant stuff.
Tact is the ability to describe others as they see themselves.
We'll love you just the way you are if you're perfect.
One man is as good as another until he has written a book.
After all is said and done, sit down.
Everything that used to be a sin is now a disease.
I own and operate a ferocious ego.
I've always wanted to go to Switzerland to see what the army does with those wee red knives.
I love to go to Washington - if only to be near my money.
I have six locks on my door all in a row. When I go out, I lock every other one. I figure no matter how long somebody stands there picking the locks, they are always locking three.
He was like a cock who thought the sun had risen to hear him crow.
Marriage is a wonderful institution, but who would want to live in an institution?
Progress was all right. Only it went on too long.
All my life, I always wanted to be somebody. Now I see that I should have been more specific.
The first day one is a guest, the second a burden, and the third a pest.
To be or not to be. That's not really a question.
I distrust camels, and anyone else who can go a week without a drink.
Originality is the fine art of remembering what you hear but forgetting where you heard it.
Any kid will run any errand for you, if you ask at bedtime.
I was a vegetarian until I started leaning toward the sunlight.
Every man has a sane spot somewhere.
Older people shouldn't eat health food, they need all the preservatives they can get.
